text: Dedunu Wessa (The Rainbow Rain) () is a 2006 Sri Lankan Sinhala romantic film directed by Buddhika Jayaratne as his maiden direction and co-produced by Colombo Pictures and Piyal Seneviratne. It stars Buddhika Jayaratne himself, with Malini Fonseka and Jeevan Kumaratunga in lead roles along with Miss Sri Lanka Rozanne Diaz and popular singer Madhumadhawa Aravinda in supportive roles. Music composed by Tharupathi Munasinghe. It is the 1064th Sri Lankan film in the Sinhala cinema. ==Plot== ==Cast== * Malini Fonseka * Jeevan Kumaratunga * Buddhika Jayaratne * Rozanne Diaz * Madhumadhawa Aravinda * Nirosha Perera * Rajitha Hiran * Teddy Vidyalankara * Tharindu Wijesinghe * Srimal Wedisinghe * Prashani Perera ==References== Category:Sri Lankan films Category:2006 films Category:Sinhala-language films
title: Dedunu Wessa
